dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of 60,000 training and 10,000 testing digit images, each representing one of 10 classes (digits 0-9).
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: The CMU Multi-PIE dataset contains face images with variations in viewpoint, illumination, and expression. The authors used a subset with 5 viewpoints and smiling expression variations, totaling 68,810 images.
dcterms:title: CMU Multi-PIE
